name: Laura Mitchell
background: Laura grew up in a small town in Minnesota, surrounded by forests and lakes, which sparked her early interest in nature and environmental issues. She attended the University of Wisconsin-Madison, earning a degree in Environmental Science. After college, she volunteered for two years with AmeriCorps, engaging in various ecological restoration projects across the Midwest.
life_experiences: Hiked the Appalachian Trail solo for 3 months
Published a research paper on the effects of urban development on local ecosystems
Volunteered in Costa Rica with a wildlife conservation program
Participated in a workshop on sustainable urban farming
Organized a local river cleanup event that drew over 100 volunteers
